title: Salmon, Avocado and Wasabi Cream Blinis
ingredients: ['1 avocado, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon wasabi', '150ml creme fraiche', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '3 tablespoons vodka', '4 blinis', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '8 slices raw salmon (from a fillet) or smoked salmon', 'caviar for garnish', 'celery leaves for garnish', 'salt and pepper to taste']
